EmailTemplate.name: PS Reminder for Ticket Owner EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder for Assigned Support Ticket : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFullName},
Kindly be informed that ticket {!Case.CaseNumber} is assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName} since {!Case.CH_AssignedDate__c} and pending actions to move forward.
Please review the ticket and take necessary actions.
Details of the Issue:
{!Case.Subject}
Regards, Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
